  • Constructor Details

    • JDBCDoctorNotesManager

      public JDBCDoctorNotesManager(ConnectionManager cManager)
      Manages the doctorNotes-related operations using a JDBC connection. Uses an instance of ConnectionManager to interact with the SQLite database.
      Parameters:
      cManager - The ConnectionManager instance used for database operations.

  • Method Details

    • addDoctorNote

      public void addDoctorNote(DoctorsNote doctorsNote)
      Adds a new DoctorsNote to the "DoctorNotes" table in the database. Uses the provided DoctorsNote object to insert the doctor's note information.
      Specified by:
      addDoctorNote in interface DoctorNotesManager
      Parameters:
      doctorsNote - The DoctorsNote object containing the doctor's note details (description).
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error during the SQL operation.

    • getDoctorsNoteByMRID

      public List<DoctorsNote> getDoctorsNoteByMRID(Integer medicalRecord_id) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a List<DoctorsNote> object with provides all the doctor's note information. Create a List<DoctorsNote> object to insert the doctor's note information obtain from the database.
      Specified by:
      getDoctorsNoteByMRID in interface DoctorNotesManager
      Parameters:
      medicalRecord_id - id of medicalRecord, related to the doctor's note.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error during the SQL operation.
